extendedInfo.description: In this program you can make yourself a bouquet using more than 40 different flowers, vases, and ribbons for bouquets, backdrops and additional elements (rabbit, a bear or a hippo, candles, hearts, etc.). When you created a bouquet, you can save it on your phone or send to your friends as greetings to any celebration.Expand your imagination, create and make happy others. Recommended screen resolution is at least 320 to 480! We will develop and refine our programm, so, please, before you put a low estimate, write to us - perhaps we will publish tomorrow a new version of the program, which will please you even more! Keywords: bouquet, flowers, greetings, congratulations, gift, joy, celebration, make a bouquet, gift bouquet.

reviews.comment: The flowers are nice, but ads slow it down drastically. Gets irritating....
reviews.author: A Google User
